lead_paragraph: The streaming music service is seeking more money to better compete with rivals like Apple and Pandora, according to a person briefed on the plans.
snippet: The streaming music service is seeking more money to better compete with rivals like Apple and Pandora, according to a person briefed on the plans.

headline.main: Spotify Is Said to Be Seeking $500 Million in New Funds
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Spotify Is Said to Aim to Raise $500 Million

abstract: Spotify plans to raise minimum of $500 million in new funding through debt offering.
